head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths NEUES, HENRY G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths NEUES, HENRY G.

block.p: NEUES-Henry G. On August 8, 2000. Son of the late Mae and George Neues. Recipient of the Medal of Freedom. Retiree of Sandia National Laboratories. Funeral mass Wednesday at 9:30 AM in the Chapel of St Dominic's R.C. Church, Oyster Bay, L.I. Interment Lutheran Cemetery, Middle Village N.Y. Please call the Francis P. Devine Funeral Home in Oyster Bay for further info.
